This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS toString is correct for scale(0, 0)
PASS toString is correct for scale(1, 2)
PASS toString is correct for scale(-2, -4)
PASS toString is correct for scale(3.4, 2.7)
PASS toString is correct for scale3d(0, 0, 0)
PASS toString is correct for scale3d(1, 2, 3)
PASS toString is correct for scale3d(3.5, -2.7, -2)
PASS Invalid number of arguments to constructor throws an exception.
FAIL Invalid input throws an exception. assert_throws: function "() => { new CSSScale(0, 0, undefined); }" did not throw
PASS asMatrix is constructed correctly for scale(0, 0)
PASS asMatrix is constructed correctly for scale(1, 2)
PASS asMatrix is constructed correctly for scale(-2, -4)
PASS asMatrix is constructed correctly for scale(3.4, 2.7)
PASS asMatrix is constructed correctly for scale3d(0, 0, 0)
PASS asMatrix is constructed correctly for scale3d(1, 2, 3)
PASS asMatrix is constructed correctly for scale3d(3.5, -2.7, -2)
Harness: the test ran to completion.
